Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
check=true local debris=game:GetService("Debris")
walkspeed=20 maxhealth=200 local pale=BrickColor.new("Pastel yellow") local clothes=BrickColor.new("Black")
function waitfor(a,b) while a:FindFirstChild(b)==nil do a.ChildAdded:wait() end return a:FindFirstChild(b) end
local drink=waitfor(sp,"Drink")
function clicked() local plr=game.Players.LocalPlayer if plr~=nil and check then local chr=plr.Character if chr~=nil and check then check=false local humanoid=chr:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid~=nil then local anim=humanoid:LoadAnimation(drink) anim:Play() end sp.Grip=CFrame.new(-0.121022046, 0.255111873, 0.101348981, -0.0794940218, 0.363020837, -0.928383887, -0.0413999408, 0.929325461, 0.366933852, 0.995975196, 0.0676040649, -0.0588467717) wait(.5) local bodycolors=chr:FindFirstChild("Body Colors") if bodycolors~=nil then bodycolors.HeadColor=pale bodycolors.TorsoColor=clothes bodycolors.LeftArmColor=pale bodycolors.LeftLegColor=clothes bodycolors.RightArmColor=pale bodycolors.RightLegColor=clothes else local bodycolors=Instance.new("BodyColors") bodycolors.Name="Body Colors" bodycolors.HeadColor=pale bodycolors.TorsoColor=clothes bodycolors.LeftArmColor=pale bodycolors.LeftLegColor=clothes bodycolors.RightArmColor=pale bodycolors.RightLegColor=clothes bodycolors.Parent=chr end local torso=chr:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso~=nil then if torso:FindFirstChild("Sparkles")==nil then local sparkles=Instance.new("Sparkles") sparkles.SparkleColor=Color3.new(1,1,1) sparkles.Parent=torso end end local humanoid=chr:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid~=nil then humanoid.WalkSpeed=walkspeed local percent=humanoid.Health/humanoid.MaxHealth humanoid.MaxHealth=maxhealth humanoid.Health=maxhealth*percent end local slurp=sp.Handle:FindFirstChild("Slurp") if slurp~=nil then slurp:Play() end wait(1.5) breakable=sp.Handle:clone() local torso=chr:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso~=nil then local rightshoulder=torso:FindFirstChild("Right Shoulder") if rightshoulder then rightshoulder.CurrentAngle=math.pi end if torso:FindFirstChild("VampireSoundScript")==nil then local vss=sp.VampireSoundScript:clone() vss.Parent=torso vss.Disabled=false end breakable=sp.Handle:clone() breakable.Velocity=(torso.CFrame.lookVector*(-40))+(Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*2,3,(math.random()-.5)*2)*15) end breakable.RotVelocity=Vector3.new(math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5)*2*10 breakable.Name="Effect" breakable.ThrowScript.Disabled=false debris:AddItem(breakable,6) breakable.Parent=game.Workspace sp:remove() end end end
function Equipped(mouse) if mouse~=nil then mouse.Button1Down:connect(clicked) end end
sp.Equipped:connect(Equipped)

--Made by Stickmasterluke --Surrounds you with serendipity
sp=script.Parent
local sound=Instance.new("Sound") sound.SoundId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=94688738" sound.Parent=sp
while sound do sound.Pitch=(math.random()*.2)+.9 sound:Play() wait((math.random()*2)+9) end
script:remove()

--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
sp.Touched:connect(function(hit) if hit and hit.Parent~=nil then if hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")==nil and string.lower(hit.Name)~="water" and string.lower(string.sub(hit.Name,1,6))~="effect" and hit.Name~="Handle" then local sound=sp:FindFirstChild("GlassBreak") if sound~=nil then sound:Play() end sp.Anchored=true sp.CanCollide=false sp.Transparency=1 wait(1) sp:remove() end end end)
wait(5)
sp:remove()
